properties.name: Ladybower Reservoir
properties.parking: Park on the A57, East of the bridge

properties.name: Redmires Reservoir
properties.parking: Park on the verge of Soughley Lane

properties.name: Old Horns Inn
properties.notes: Has some epic views plus the benefit of food and drink. Strong WiFi (~20Mbps) on veranda, but none in the garden. Thanks to Dave Cates

properties.name: The Roaches Spring Boulders
properties.parking: Park at The Roaches UKC Parking (Google Maps) on Roach Road
properties.notes: Great views and the opportunity for some bouldering if that grabs you. Can be boggy.
